abstract: The Missoni for Target collection sold out within days, creating a reborn demand for all things Missoni - or at least a passable facsimile of the house's kaleidoscopic multitone wares.
snippet: The Missoni for Target collection sold out within days, creating a reborn demand for all things Missoni - or at least a passable facsimile of the house's kaleidoscopic multitone wares.
lead_paragraph: Waiting in mid-Manhattan last month to storm Target's pop-up shop offering the much-trumpeted Missoni for Target collection, Elsa Isaac could scarcely contain herself. "I'm thinking that this is a collector's collection," Ms. Isaac said. "People are going to talk about this for a while."
